## Form.close() method

Close the form. If force no validation will take place

**Signature:**

```typescript
close(force?: boolean): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  force | boolean | _(Optional)_ If true, no validation will occur before closing. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A promise indicating whether closing the form was successful.
